name: Sol Potion
description: Gregory J. Gordon is a San Francisco music and video game industry veteran with extensive experience in technical and creative services, music production, publishing & education. He is the founder & CEO of Pyramind Music & Audio Production Institute and a 30-year voting member of The Recording Academy (The Grammys). He produces and performs under the monikers G2 and Solsage. His music production credits include working with world renowned artists Jerry Garcia, Georgio Moroder, Rob Garza, & Joan Baez as well as AAA video game developers: Sony Interactive, Microsoft Studios, Insomniac Games & Blizzard Entertainment. Sol Potion seeks to reveal both the dark and the light in each of us and the ultimate acknowledgment that the elixir of happiness can only be found within.

attributes.value: Mystical Journey, Ethnic Instrumentation, Dance Floor Grooves, Psychedelic Overtones
